website_summaries.verdict: If it's a tiny wireless speaker you're after, the JBL Clip 2 is an appealing choice with some small but significant improvements over its predecessors.
pros: The JBL Clip 2 Bluetooth speaker is a hockey-puck-size speaker with a built-in lithium ion rechargeable battery that offers decent sound for its size, improved battery life (eight hours), and is fully waterproof
It also has an integrated line-in cable that stows away in the bottom of the device, as well as speakerphone capabilities
cons: It doesn't handle big bass well and distorts at higher volumes

customer_reviews.title: Great little personal speaker!
customer_reviews.text: I really like the size and the sound. I connect it via blue tooth to my iPhone. I listen to sleep apps, my favorite being Relax Melodies. My daughter uses her's at the beach and pool for a cozy sound in her area. Not sure what app she is using for music. Great size. It's a speaker that isn't going to affect people near by that aren't interested in our kind of music. I bought the 2 year protection for it, just in case. I also bought the case for it. It is also red, and fits well. I forgot what case.
customer_reviews.author: CShattleroe

customer_reviews.title: Pretty amazing
customer_reviews.text: I bought this a few months ago just to listen to some music when out in the yard. I have left it outside (Chicago) in near freezing rain for multiple days on end only to press the on button and hear this thing start right up. I've only charged this thing like 3 times and while I don't use it all the time, I've never had the battery die and now I just keep it outside. Sound volume/quality is good especially for the size and price. Great for the golf bag too!
customer_reviews.author: Keith Christensen

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker, except for broken front cover
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker and it's clip and water-friendly function. I carry it with me throughout the house during my daily routine, including in the shower. I'll bring it outside to enjoy some tunes and it'll clip on to my backpack perfectly. The only downside is that the speaker cover broke within days of receiving after a drop on a soft surface (carpet) and it won't snap back in place, making travel with it difficult. I'm planning on hot gluing the cover back on, because I otherwise love and will continue to use this JBL daily. I would still recommend, with a warning on the cover popping off.
customer_reviews.author: PB

customer_reviews.title: Better than UE speakers!!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this speaker!!! Initially I was going to buy the UE Boom for my bestfriend's birthday, but after I compared it to JBL's speaker I bought this. In my perspective JBL's speaker sounded a lot crisper and clearer than that of the UE. Not to mention the bass was far superior on the clip 2 as well. For a better speaker at a cheaper price, I made the right decision!
customer_reviews.author: Lizzette G.

customer_reviews.title: 10 Hours of continuous play on one charge!
customer_reviews.text: I've only had the speaker a couple of days but so far it's great! I absolutely love the portability of it. It may be small, but can get very loud. I read some reviews complaining about the bass, that's not been really an issue for me. I had it playing on my desk at work and it played for 10 hours continuously. I had absolutely no trouble pairing it with my Samsung Galaxy via bluetooth, and I even used the attached plug in my computer. Worked seamlessly. MAJOR Kudos to the designers for having the plug cord wrap around and blend in with the speaker! Love it!!!
customer_reviews.author: Tameko N. Banyard

customer_reviews.title: For such a small speaker it sounds awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I am a photographer and I got this as an option to clip onto my bag and get some music playing during sessions with clients on location. But I definitely have ended up using it more than that! I am seriously impressed with the sound quality for such a tiny speaker!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Perfect shower speaker
customer_reviews.text: Perfect shower speaker. Also a great size to throw in my bag to take along with me. Easy to use. The only negative is I can't tell how much charge/ power it has so I feel like I'm never sure if I have enough juice. But with that said I have never ran the battery all the way down. The charge last for hours!
customer_reviews.author: Ronda M

customer_reviews.title: sounds good
customer_reviews.text: good portable little speaker. Sounds really and loud enough. If youre looking to use it for a backyard party you might want something bigger/ louder. I find it good for chilling by a camp fire , on a small boat raft , working out in the garage. The clip is good for attaching to my backpack while hiking also.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Its just ok
customer_reviews.text: I've heard a lot of good things about JBL, so i decided to give this product a try. Aesthetically, its perfect and lightweight. I love that it has a clip, and the connection is really strong. However, I personally wasn't satisfied with the sound. It doesn't get loud enough. I guess its great if you don't want a lot of noise, but I need amps and bass! Should have just when with a bigger version..but I need the convenience of the size! If only..
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Bluetooth in the car
customer_reviews.text: I have an older model car so there is no Bluetooth to connect my phone, but this speaker is small yet loud and is my current work around until I get a new car.
customer_reviews.author: Benjamin Mason

customer_reviews.title: Good little speaker.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little speaker. I keep mine in the kitchen to listen to while I cook. I only just realized it can be used in the shower so maybe I will get another one, I tried a VicTsing Soundhot C6 which stopped working after one use. I would rather pay a little extra and get a product that actually works.
customer_reviews.author: Pattio

customer_reviews.title: great small bluetooth speaker with great sound
customer_reviews.text: Great little bluetooth speaker with quality sound, easy to sync to my bluetooth. I like bringing it in the shower with me and not worry if it gets wet, you can also clip it to your belt buckle and carry it around with you while you work. Only negative is that the battery life is not the best.
customer_reviews.author: Edgar

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Just used it and performance is great so far and very powerful for its size
customer_reviews.author: Juan Mejia

customer_reviews.title: It was great for awhile and then...
customer_reviews.text: Love JBL and loved this speaker. Never had it near water but had it in a fanny pack and away I would go. Had it two months and it just stopped working. Didn't totally die because a blue light is still on however no Bluetooth, no charging, no playing. Talked with JBL rep today so we shall see what happens. Great little speaker for two months.
customer_reviews.author: heavenlyhorse

customer_reviews.title: Small but loud! Perfect for the beach.
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had this speaker for 2 years and it still sounds and holds battery life like it did when I first purchased it. I’ve used it at the beach, in my shower, even had a kid accidentally drop it in the pool and it’s still in great shape. The sound is crystal clear and it’s suprizingly loud for how small the actual speaker is.
customer_reviews.author: Alex Lipford

customer_reviews.title: Pretty good. 1 big flaw - connected distance
customer_reviews.text: The sound and function of this speaker is great. However, the range of connection is crap. Its like 5ft max. Which can get quite frustrating unless you have it clipped on you.
customer_reviews.author: BeefSupreme

customer_reviews.title: although sounds a bit muffled but after water is dried out its better (still not enough for me to not love this ...
customer_reviews.text: Took it on a float trip and it was dropped in the water many times and still works. I've submerged it in water and pulled it out with music still playing, although sounds a bit muffled but after water is dried out its better (still not enough for me to not love this speaker). I also use this in my garage when working and at full volume its too loud that I have to turn down a few clicks.
customer_reviews.author: Niko

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound
customer_reviews.text: I clip this speaker on my paddleboard. There is a lot of traffic on the lake so there are plenty of waves and this definitely gets wet every time. That said, I love the sound quality and simple controls. This is by far way better than previous speakers I have tried.
customer_reviews.author: Hope

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: Thought I had reviewed this already. It is massive, but I love it. I use it for music and navigation in the car, for clear directions. Very helpful, practical, nice looking, and I am getting used to the size. I bought the larger version for music on my boudoir. Impressive!
customer_reviews.author: flowergirl3

customer_reviews.title: Very portable clips on your belt buckle
customer_reviews.text: Very portable clips on your belt buckleAs I work on the construction site we have different subcontractors working all over the building. Usually different kinds of music all playing at the same time. I tell everybody to buy this and put it on their belt buckle so they don't have the blast the music from the third floor to the first floor. Clipping on your belt and bring the music with you
customer_reviews.author: Vincent

customer_reviews.title: Sounds amazing
customer_reviews.text: This is a great item. It sounds amazing and we already have three portable Bluetooth speakers of various shapes etc., Bought this for a trip and it will be a staple for the backyard and the beach. Small and the quality is excellent. Works to pair quickly which can often be an issue. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Diane Lewis

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for the shower
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to bluetooth my phone music to it while in the shower. Hooks up fast, can get very load (I love load music but probably only have this up halfway), sound quality is good (it is just a shower radio remember), and I havent charged it yet after 5+ showers! Great little speaker then more than does the job.
customer_reviews.author: Jordyn W

customer_reviews.title: For the price a very good deal
customer_reviews.text: It connects fine and the sound is a big improvement over my phone. The battery lasts a long time between charges. My yoga instructor has had one for a couple of years now and had no problems; I have had mine only a few months but also no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Billy Bear

customer_reviews.title: works great, but would be perfect if it was a tiny bit louder
customer_reviews.text: I mainly use this while biking, and it's perfect for that. The only issue is when you get moving quickly, the sound gets drowned out by the wind. Kind of wish it had one additional level of volume. For the size, price, reliability and waterproof rating, it really can't be beat.
customer_reviews.author: Camazon Amustomers

customer_reviews.title: BEST lil speaker
customer_reviews.text: This is the BEST lil speaker! I was really surprised by how loud it got. I use it for my bike rides, hanging out with my friends, my outdoor workouts, watching movies on my computer....everything. Its worth the investment for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Rayell Grayson

customer_reviews.title: Best waterproof bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: I already had one of these speakers in blue and wanted a second one because you can chain two of them together via bluetooth for a higher volume. It took me a little bit to get them working together, but once I had it down it was easy. Great sound! Seriously waterproof - usually our group uses these camping and on the water - boats, tubes, jet skis. Never had an issue. Overall great blueooth speaker from JBL.
customer_reviews.author: Sierra

customer_reviews.title: LOVE IT!!!
customer_reviews.text: Wow! Love this!! I bought this little speaker because my friend had one! It has great sound, she said she “had it forever”.... I just clipped this thing right on my paddleboard! Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.author: Deanne K.

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work well with Bandcamp
customer_reviews.text: It's fine except whenever I play music from the Bandcamp app, almost every two tracks or sometimes every other track, the music will just stop playing thru the speaker. It doesn't disconnect- it just stops making sound at all. I have to stop what I'm doing (I usually use it while riding my bike) to access the app, stop and restart the music and then it will work again. Two tracks later it does it again, and so on. I use Bandcamp a lot so this is especially annoying.
customer_reviews.author: Holly Dyer

customer_reviews.title: Surprisingly big sound for such a small speaker
customer_reviews.text: We typically use it for audio books when we're outdoors enjoying our yard. It was easy to connect to my phone for my audible app. Battery life seems pretty good, but haven't let it run out yet.
customer_reviews.author: dragonfly

customer_reviews.title: A small speaker that packs a punch!
customer_reviews.text: Best little speaker for the price. Super loud! Not only do have one I have two because I love this little thing so much. I keep one in my car and one in my purse. I have dropped them many times and they still work very well. The only complaint I have is that they can be difficult to pair.
customer_reviews.author: Lynn

customer_reviews.title: Works loud and proud, definitely waterproof too!
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof as advertised and haven't needed to purchase any extra speakers. Wished I would've gone with JBL clip than my previous water "resistant" speakers.
customer_reviews.author: Midwest Sport and Spine

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker, Horrible range
customer_reviews.text: Really loud, surprisingly loud actually. But the worse range I've seen on any speaker ever. If its even half a foot away it starts breaking up. Good sound but frustrating that I can't use my phone at the same time because they need to be directly next to each other
customer_reviews.author: i.wiley

customer_reviews.title: Great size, good sound and durable.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great size and has pretty good sound for being so little. The best aspect is it is water resistant. My previous mini bluetooth speaker was involved in an unfortunate spilled coffee incident in my briefcase. This one will be a little more resilient.
customer_reviews.author: submariner in Arizona

customer_reviews.title: Amazing build
customer_reviews.text: Love the build quality on this!!! I always use it in the shower and works perfectly fine!! Even when wet! The only downside is that I wish it was a built louder. But that might just be me,its still plenty loud to fill your bedroom and even loud enough for your living room
customer_reviews.author: Gabriel A

customer_reviews.title: Great portable speaker
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this for about a year and a half attached to my backpack while bike commuting. It's great! Loud enough for me to hear it. It's light, and has survived pretty brutal downpours. Very durable. The battery is starting to die now, but that's expected of rechargeable batteries especially considering I used this every single day.
customer_reviews.author: Gordon Zheng

customer_reviews.title: Dependable
customer_reviews.text: I love these JBL Clips. I use them at work where there is a lot of machinery noise and other speakers playing music and its sound quality is perfect - not too loud, muffled, or otherwise. It has a nice battery life and it can take some damage.
customer_reviews.author: DeSadeM

customer_reviews.title: Waterproof feature is really nice.
customer_reviews.text: Not super loud and a bit tinny sounding at full volume. However, its fun to clip in the kayak and go for a paddle without worrying about it getting wet and plenty loud to hear while doing so. We have 2 and my daughter likes to bring hers in the shower. No issues with the waterproof feature.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa

customer_reviews.title: value is strong
customer_reviews.text: actual speaker companies do not put their name on junk. this speaker sounds much larger than it is. when used as a speaker phone, the audio in done right scary. buy 2, you will be gifting somebody when they hear it.
customer_reviews.author: Houston Guy

customer_reviews.title: Works well!
customer_reviews.text: Its great. The sound is good. Got it for work barely has a 2hr battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Jenn

customer_reviews.title: Light, loud, good sound, compact, waterproof...a smart little speaker
customer_reviews.text: I have 2 of these already and bought one for a friend. You can hang it in the shower, the battery lasts a few hours, it's light and has a clip, it has good sound and is loud enough to use in a classroom. Great little speaker.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: I was surprised the speakers are very well-made it has good sound thank you ice
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised the speakers are very well-made it has good sound thank you
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good sound look on YouTube for review if needed more info
customer_reviews.text: These have a pretty good sound I like you can answer calls use them for my boys when they go to sleep at night no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Crook26

customer_reviews.title: BT connects solidly
customer_reviews.text: I really like these speakers(have 2 of them.) Good sound and easy BT connectivity. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Steven J. Meurett

customer_reviews.title: JBL Portable Bluetooth Speaker
customer_reviews.text: This little speaker is amazing. What great sound! Absolutely love this! So easy to move from room to room. I remember when the speakers took up so much room. You can hang this anywhere, and it blends right in to the background!
customer_reviews.author: Allibaba51

customer_reviews.title: Good sound
customer_reviews.text: I will always be able to play a little relaxing music when i recreate at the park. Without my ears being blocked and my hearing diminished as my family and friends are relaxing at the park with me. I'm sure you'll be delighted as well.
customer_reviews.author: anna

customer_reviews.title: Loud, crisp sound!!
customer_reviews.text: I've written one other Amazon review in the last decade. That's how good this speaker is. I was shocked. The sound is crisp and LOUD, especially for the size. I ordered the JBL Flip 4 for my husband but it has not arrived yet and I'm honestly wondering whether or not he even needs one that large once I heard how amazing the sound is on this. The attached aux cords is a good length but is easily tucked way if you're using bluetooth. I do a lot of backpacking and I'm stoked to use this!
customer_reviews.author: Kerri Morales

customer_reviews.title: Not loud enough
customer_reviews.text: I keep it out in the shed for when I'm working on my stuff. Not really loud enough and it cuts in and out alot. I guess from being too far from my phone sometimes?
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth Lee

customer_reviews.title: I just love this. Very nice portable speaker yet sounds very ...
customer_reviews.text: I just love this. Very nice portable speaker yet sounds very powerful. I take this to all over my house when I clean house, or read book in the patio, or during cooking. Especially long driving I must have this.
customer_reviews.author: chisa

customer_reviews.title: It sounds OK but just needs low end
customer_reviews.text: I gt this for my daughter. She listens to it in the mornings before school. It sounds good for a kid but audiophile will want something better. There is little bass in the speaker. It sounds OK but just needs low end.
customer_reviews.author: Redbeard's Garage

customer_reviews.title: Not for a speakerphone but decent speaker
customer_reviews.text: Works well for music in the car (when no satellite available) and home. Sound quality is 4 star for music but as a speakerphone it did not do the job; hence the 3 stars.
customer_reviews.author: janetv

customer_reviews.title: Actually waterproof
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound for a small speaker. I’ve used this in the shower countless times. It has fallen ok the shower still works perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: zev rosenberg

customer_reviews.title: #BestSpeakerEver!
customer_reviews.text: This JBL speaker is the bomb!!! It may be small but boy does it pack a punch. You will not be disappointed with this waterproof Bluetooth speaker. It's the perfect size to take with you anywhere and has outstanding sound quality. I'm very pleased with my purchase!!!
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING
customer_reviews.text: these are awesome, have a great battery life and can get pretty loud. I've used these during construction jobs and you can hear so clearly. They clip almost anywhere and are simple to connect to bluetooth AND amazon has it much cheaper than walmart
customer_reviews.author: Monica Tamayo

customer_reviews.title: Good speaker
customer_reviews.text: Good small Bluetooth speaker. Sound is decent. Replaced the last JBL speaker I gad that finally died on me. I’m still happy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Buondelmonte

customer_reviews.title: What a great little speaker!
customer_reviews.text: You can clip it on to your belt loop for multi-room audio. Great for travel. Great sound. I bet it sounds even better and louder with 2 speakers paired simultaneously in stereo mode. I can see why it won design awards. I recommend the LTGEM EVA hard case for it.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: JBL always makes good speakers! Good price, easy to take anywhere.
customer_reviews.text: Unreal sound from this speaker. Friends purchased it as soon as they heard it. Easy to take anywhere you go and easy to operate. You will love this speaker! It is worth every penny!
customer_reviews.author: BOJO

customer_reviews.title: Quit Working
customer_reviews.text: Had this less then a year and will no longer connect to bluetooth. I did buy it used but expected it to last longer than this.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Altman

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Took this on a hiking trip. Absolutely loved it. Great sound quality and battery life.
customer_reviews.author: Stacecake

customer_reviews.title: Good sound and clip is nice for back pack or belt loop
customer_reviews.text: Good sound really like these. Think they are seconds because the charging droor is a bit hard to close. Bought insurance so it can be replaced if any problem with charge port or battery life. Plays about 4 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Andrea

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2
customer_reviews.text: Bought the black one and it lasted around a full year of nearly daily use very close to water. Gave out so I bought a red one, but it seems to be quieter while having longer battery life. Not sure if this is an error or if the colors are made differently
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Wright

customer_reviews.title: Compact size with excellent sound quality.
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little portable speaker. It is easy to carry and you can buy a carrying case to protect it. The sound is excellent for the size and Bluetooth makes it convenient. Perfect for poolside, hotel room or the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Collin J Hite

customer_reviews.title: My dad loves his Father’s Day gift!
customer_reviews.text: Great speaker- good and clear quality. Lives true to being waterproof. (That being said don’t go deep sea diving with this). My father loved it for father’s day. He uses it all around the house. The red color is very vibrant and nice. Very portable.
customer_reviews.author: AZPrimeGirl

customer_reviews.title: Perfect little speaker
customer_reviews.text: Size, quality of sound and price all line up! Love that I can hook it to my backpack or beach umbrella.
customer_reviews.author: Marsha

customer_reviews.title: awsome unit.
customer_reviews.text: this are great for outdoor. i work on the construction field and this thing can take a beating. the dust and water wont mess it up, or at least it will holp up better than other bluetooths. highly recommended
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Ventura

customer_reviews.title: Great device
customer_reviews.text: I use this when I am playing golf - play music through my phone. My lady golfers love it. We dance as we swing. Super fun and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: little speaker big sound
customer_reviews.text: this speaker is awesome for how small it is. Its loud enough I could hear it on my jet ski until I started going over 20mph but was nice to have when I stopped. Quickest device I've ever had when it comes to linking up with my phone hands down!
customer_reviews.author: Tonya

customer_reviews.title: Sounds Great
customer_reviews.text: I love this speaker sounds great and works as expected.
customer_reviews.author: Lori

customer_reviews.title: This was the best gift I got myself!
customer_reviews.text: I use it in and out of the shower and it works great! I could stand for it to get a bit louder, but I really can't complain. I love it.
customer_reviews.author: PunkyLoserJess

customer_reviews.title: Speaker Sounds Choppy Like It's Giving Out After 10 Days of Use
customer_reviews.text: Well the speaker sounds like it's going to blow out soon and I just bought it 10 days ago. Very poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Avalos

customer_reviews.title: Good portable speaker with excellent sound quality
customer_reviews.text: Paid $38, excellent sound for the size. Battery life is also excellent, however it's a micro USB power port as most devices/phone are USB C.
customer_reviews.author: GCPangsa_1

customer_reviews.title: Perfect speak to use anywhere!
customer_reviews.text: Love this little guy! I use him all the time. The quality is really good. Sound is clear. I like the red color too. For the amount of money it’s a steal! The battery doesn’t last as long as I like but other than that it’s awezome!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice speaker!
customer_reviews.text: Crazy good sound comes from this little speaker. Gets really loud and clarity is amazing. Being waterproof makes it great for the shower or a day out in the kayak.
customer_reviews.author: Meaok

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Connects really quick, turns on really quick, sounds really good. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: JJ

customer_reviews.title: Great speaker!
customer_reviews.text: It gave off great sound and the clip was helpful for playing music at cons
customer_reviews.author: Atem king

customer_reviews.title: Not near advertised battery life
customer_reviews.text: Advertised 8hr battery life. First one didn’t come close, I returned it and second one didn’t come close. Barely makes 4hrs on full charge. I bought for golf but if doesn’t quite get the full round despite the 8hr supposed battery life. I plan on getting rid of it and getting something else. I’m disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Michael Becht

customer_reviews.title: Love it, works great
customer_reviews.text: I use it every day at work, the belt clip is super useful, the battery life us crazy good, and it can take a beating. Also the connection goes pretty far
customer_reviews.author: Jacob Hiler

customer_reviews.title: The best product
customer_reviews.text: This is a beast in a small package. Would highly recommend for its design, looks, sound quality, waterproof feature. Its almost 1 year that i am using and had no problem so far.
customer_reviews.author: Arpit Lasod

customer_reviews.title: Obviously the speakers are poor quality and the wiring is defective
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this speaker from this company. I have used it for 10 months and the sound now has very little volume and is fuzzy and cuts out. Obviously the speakers are poor quality and the wiring is defective. Beware counterfeits. It only has a 30 day warranty and the company does nothing to help with a fix.
customer_reviews.author: JUDITH C TRAVIS

customer_reviews.title: Amazing sound quality for the price and size
customer_reviews.text: Amazing sound quality for the price and size. This is our second one. Truly waterproof in the shower with long battery life. Gives our B&O a run for its money.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Very good build. I hung it on the shower curtain ...
customer_reviews.text: Little but loud speaker. Very good build. I hung it on the shower curtain ring and used it during showering and no problem.
customer_reviews.author: Bin

customer_reviews.title: JBL speakers are top of the line
customer_reviews.text: My wife totally enjoys her on the go speakers. Perfect for her to listen to her music anywhere she is via bluetooth connection.
customer_reviews.author: Handyman247 LLC

customer_reviews.title: Big Tunes, Small Package
customer_reviews.text: Stylish, crisp sound, easy carry, all around a great product that will serve you for years. Head phones off to JBL, nicely done.
customer_reviews.author: Kevin William

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: This speaker does not turn off due to inactivity and thus will stay on until it loses battery. When the battery is low, it just keeps beeping during songs. It’s annoying and dumb
customer_reviews.author: Cindy Kim

customer_reviews.title: Great Sound!
customer_reviews.text: Love, Love, Love it!!! Bought it to go tubing. Was loud & clear.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Mom got it right this time!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my daughter to use on her jet ski. She absolutely loves it. I was surprised at the volume and sound quality!
customer_reviews.author: Teresa H.

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: This is the third JBL speaker I bought (after Charge and another Clip). This time I bought it for a friend. Excellent product!
customer_reviews.author: Oz Gilat

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: The little thing is very impressive for the size. The clip is sturdy and it’s really simple to connect via Bluetooth. I do wish it could be a little louder, but it’s amazing still.
customer_reviews.author: Michael James Grinder

customer_reviews.title: Great small inexpensive blue tooth portable.
customer_reviews.text: Dynamite little speaker, with emphasis on small and versatile. Definetly worth the $. Not great if you must have crystal clear highs and booming bass.
customer_reviews.author: joelrides

customer_reviews.title: Poor range
customer_reviews.text: I love the sound and design- it clips to my backpack and lays flat but i had to return it because the range was only about30 feet and it kept dropping Bluetooth connection
customer_reviews.author: Jodi B.

customer_reviews.title: Love my speaker
customer_reviews.text: Love my speaker. I bought two more for gifts. Has good quality sound and can leave it in my bathroom or take it outside.
customer_reviews.author: Jan

customer_reviews.title: such a convenient little speaker. 4 stars because the ...
customer_reviews.text: such a convenient little speaker. 4 stars because the speaker cover fell off of it after 6 months of use but i clipped it back on and it hasnt come off since.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Pairs easily. Sounds good
customer_reviews.text: Pairs easily. Sounds good. Looks good. Shipping was quick. Aux cable is convenient. Good sound for a tiny little speaker. Really easy to carry around and annoy strangers while you and your friends are jamming out.
customer_reviews.author: Steve J. Park

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: Music quality is great. Battery could last a little longer and volume could be a higher. I own 2.

customer_reviews.title: Great Bluetooth speaker
customer_reviews.text: Great sound quality, easy to use buttons, I can use it in the shower for WEEKS before needing to charge it. Perfect for what I needed.

customer_reviews.title: Great sound
customer_reviews.text: This speaker is great! I keep it in my car because my stereo isn’t the best. The sound is great just as if I was playing me stereo.

customer_reviews.text: I LOVE this speaker! So easy to use, connects to Bluetooth easily and sounds great! Great little speaker. :-)

customer_reviews.text: This little gadget has a kick to it, it has high-quality sound and it can get loud. Great price

customer_reviews.text: This little speaker has the sound quality and depth of any surround sound speaker, it is also awesome and convenient to use. I’d give it ten stars if I could!!
